title: Shopify Customer
description: A customer in a Shopify store

created_at.description: The date and time when the customer was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the customer was last modified

accepts_marketing.description: Whether the customer has consented to receive marketing material via email

verified_email.description: Whether the customer has verified their email address

state.description: The state of the customer's account (enabled, disabled, invited, declined)

tags.description: Tags that the shop owner has attached to the customer

addresses.description: A list of addresses for the customer
